content: पचन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पच्-करणे ल्युट्] Cooking, dressing, maturing &c. --नः Fire. --ना Becoming ripe, ripening. --नी The wild citron tree. --नं {@--1@} Cooking, dressing, maturing &c. {@--2@} A means or instrument for cooking, a vessel, fuel &c. {@--3@} Ripening, maturing. {@--4@} Becoming cooked or ripe.
